description: Manage identities of an image builder template.

commands.name: az image builder identity assign
commands.summary: Add managed identities to an existing image builder template. Currently, only one user identity is supported.
examples: az image builder identity assign --name MyImageBuilderTemplate --resource-group MyResourceGroup --user-assigned MyAssignedId

commands.name: az image builder identity remove
commands.summary: Remove managed identities from an existing image builder template.
examples: az image builder identity remove --name MyImageBuilderTemplate --resource-group MyResourceGroup --user-assigned MyAssignedId
az image builder identity remove --name MyImageBuilderTemplate --resource-group MyResourceGroup --user-assigned

commands.name: az image builder identity show
commands.summary: Display managed identities of a image builder template.
examples: az image builder identity show --name MyImageBuilderTemplate --resource-group MyResourceGroup
